elementValueMap.IC-OpptyRecordType: =IF(EQUALS(%OpportunityDetails:OpportunityType%,'In Group Change Local'),ARRAY(['Dead', 'In Progress', 'Lost', 'Sold']),IF(EQUALS(%OpportunityDetails:OpportunityType%,'New Business Local'),ARRAY(['Dead', 'Declined to Quote', 'In Progress', 'Lost', 'Sold']),IF(EQUALS(%OpportunityDetails:OpportunityType%,'In Group Add Product Local'),ARRAY(['Declined to Quote','IGAP Dead', 'IGAP In Progress', 'IGAP Lost', 'IGAP Sold']),IF(EQUALS(%OpportunityDetails:OpportunityType%,'Renewal Local'),ARRAY(['In Progress', 'IGAP Dead', 'IGAP In Progress', 'IGAP Lost', 'IGAP Sold', 'Jeopardy', 'Not renewing in Current Period', 'Renewed', 'Termed']),''))))
elementValueMap.IMP-ProgramStages: =IF(EQUALS(%OpportunityDetails:OpportunityType%,'In Group Change Local'),ARRAY(['Dead', 'In Progress', 'Lost', 'Sold']),IF(EQUALS(%OpportunityDetails:OpportunityType%,'New Business Local'),ARRAY(['Dead', 'Declined to Quote', 'In Progress', 'Lost', 'Sold']),IF(EQUALS(%OpportunityDetails:OpportunityType%,'In Group Add Product Local'),ARRAY(['Declined to Quote','IGAP Dead', 'IGAP In Progress', 'IGAP Lost', 'IGAP Sold']),IF(EQUALS(%OpportunityDetails:OpportunityType%,'Renewal Local'),ARRAY(['In Progress', 'IGAP Dead', 'IGAP In Progress', 'IGAP Lost', 'IGAP Sold', 'Jeopardy', 'Not renewing in Current Period', 'Renewed', 'Termed']),''))))
